name: Epic Adventures: La Jangada
description: Help Minha in the hidden object adventure to save her father from the gallows in this 19th century. The epic story is based on Jules Verneâ€™s novel La Jangada. Find evidence and solve intriuging puzzles as you travel through the great Amazon.
